name: PENGU CLASH
description: Pengu Clash is a Telegram-based multiplayer gaming platform developed by the popular Pudgy Penguins NFT brand. Launched in early access on May 3, 2025, the game operates on the TON blockchain using Elympics infrastructure to deliver fast-paced, skill-based gaming experiences. Players control customizable penguin characters called “Pengus” in various 1v1 mini-games including darts, football, and bomber.
